items.title: "A French trial on Elstar and Suntan apples reduced sunburns versus untreated and kaolin plots. Conference pears held best against pear leaf scorching. Users find it easy to use with no nozzle clogs like clay products,"

“We are very proud to support a key sector for Tunisia at a time when digitalisation and connectivity are of very high and ever-increasing importance. Partnering with the Tunisian government and the EU, we are contributing to the modernisation of Tunisie Telecom and the digital transformation of the country. This upgrade will also enhance connectivity to Europe and ultimately help position the country as a key digital hub across the Mediterranean region and in Africa”
"In good faith, the industry proactively responded to the requests of government; and now it's been hung out to dry, costing modest family businesses huge amounts of money,"

"A French trial on Elstar and Suntan apples reduced sunburns versus untreated and kaolin plots. Conference pears held best against pear leaf scorching. Users find it easy to use with no nozzle clogs like clay products,"

"The first crates left the warehouse as early as mid-November, marking the start of a year that is proving to be positive in terms of commercial feedback, especially beyond national borders. The current season is very pleasing, especially thanks to the response from Dutch and British customers, but also from German ones. All these operators work with quotations that are almost double the prices charged on the Italian market, rewarding continuity and volumes,"

“Il combinato di prezzi non remunerativi, aumento dei costi e concorrenza sleale – (\*) – rischia di compromettere seriamente la continuità produttiva di molte aziende, con conseguenze rilevanti anche sul piano occupazionale e territoriale. Per questo Confagricoltura Puglia chiede la convocazione immediata del Tavolo Latte, coinvolgendo tutte le parti interessate, per avviare un confronto urgente e individuare misure condivise di tutela del prezzo, rafforzamento dei controlli e valorizzazione della produzione lattiero-casearia pugliese”
"With this operation we are completing a strategic integration journey that has, over the years, proven its effectiveness in terms of results and innovation,"
"We are delighted that OHB System AG has selected Thales Alenia Space in the UK to contribute our advanced capabilities and propulsion expertise to this remarkable scientific mission,"

“Resta però fondamentale intervenire anche sull’assistenza ai passeggeri: i call center delle compagnie aeree – (\*) – dovrebbero garantire informazioni tempestive e un servizio clienti adeguato e realmente accessibile: oggi, troppo spesso, i viaggiatori si trovano di fronte a chat interminabili e numeri telefonici difficili da reperire”
